definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Platform is surrounded by banks of the Dadu River from the date from the red granite thorough.
sentences.chinese: 台基四周是用来自大渡河畔的枣红色花岗石彻起。

sentences.english: The granite sculpture is the work of Chinese sculptor Lei Yixin.
sentences.chinese: 这座花岗石雕塑是中国雕塑家雷宜锌的作品。

sentences.english: The circular courtyard, in front of the ancestral hall, is also paved with granite plate.
sentences.chinese: 回望祖堂前的圆形天井，也同样是以花岗石板铺面。

sentences.english: A 10-meter high sculpture of King is carved from the center piece.
sentences.chinese: 马丁路德金10米高的塑像，就雕在花岗石的中间。

sentences.english: When landscaping around granite, plants are chosen to contract the stone.
sentences.chinese: 花岗石常作为主景雕塑，植物配置起烘托的作用。

sentences.english: Nanxiong has abundant resources of granite and clay.
sentences.chinese: 南雄有丰富的花岗石和红土资源。

sentences.english: A granitic rock composed chiefly of quartz and mica.
sentences.chinese: 一种由石英和云母构成的花岗石。

sentences.english: The physical properties of granite are well known.
sentences.chinese: 花岗石的物理特性是众所周知的。

sentences.english: But then, what splendid fires blazed continually on the hearths of Granite House, the smoke marking the granite wall with long, zebra-like streaks!
sentences.chinese: 花岗石壁被烟熏成一条条的，和斑马身上的花纹一样。

sentences.english: The monument is made of marble and granite.
sentences.chinese: 这座纪念碑是由大理石和花岗石制成的。

sentences.english: White walls, granite rock hill, the perfect combination of form and construction.
sentences.chinese: 白墙，花岗石岩坡顶，与建筑形体完美结合。

sentences.english: His grave is made of granite.
sentences.chinese: 他的墓是用花岗石造的。

sentences.english: The southern Guizhou is rich in granite resources.
sentences.chinese: 黔南地区花岗石资源丰富。

sentences.english: This paper puts foruard the way how to assure the ornamental covers quality of modelled granite ceramic tile.
sentences.chinese: 本文对如何保证仿花岗石砖饰面质量问题进行了阐述。

sentences.english: Under its famous arched granite masonry, they vowed an enduring love.
sentences.chinese: 在其著名的花岗石拱下，他俩说出永恒的誓言。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
